text:
Scores of hats up for auction, including those of Grace Kelly and Judy Garland

Disney’s Mickey Mouse ears up for grabs A collection of memorabilia, including Babe Ruth’s baseball glove and Walt Disney’s Mickey Mouse ears, that once belonged to radio personality Joe Franklin will be auctioned in Maine on April 2. Today's Paper More In: NATIONAL Tweet
title: John Wayne’s hat, Disney’s Mickey Mouse ears up for auction
